verses.verse: And it came to pass in the seventh<WH7637> year<WH8141>, in the fifth<WH2549> month, the tenth<WH6218> day of the month<WH2320>, that certain<WH582> of the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> came<WH935> to inquire<WH1875> of the LORD<WH3068>, and sat<WH3427> before<WH6440> me.
Then came the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> unto me, saying<WH559>,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, speak<WH1696> unto the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Are ye come<WH935> to inquire<WH1875> of me? As I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, I will not be inquired<WH1875> of by you.
Wilt thou judge<WH8199> them, son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, wilt thou judge<WH8199> them? cause them to know<WH3045> the abominations<WH8441> of their fathers<WH1>:

¶ And say<WH559> unto them, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; In the day<WH3117> when I chose<WH977> Israel<WH3478>, and lifted up<WH5375> mine hand<WH3027> unto the seed<WH2233> of the house<WH1004> of Jacob<WH3290>, and made myself known<WH3045> unto them in the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, when I lifted<WH5375> up mine hand<WH3027> unto them, saying<WH559>, I am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>;

In the day<WH3117> that I lifted up<WH5375> mine hand<WH3027> unto them, to bring them forth<WH3318> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> into a land<WH776> that I had espied<WH8446> for them, flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>, which is the glory<WH6643> of all lands<WH776>:

Then said<WH559> I unto them, Cast ye away<WH7993> every man<WH376> the abominations<WH8251> of his eyes<WH5869>, and defile<WH2930> not yourselves with the idols<WH1544> of Egypt<WH4714>: I am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>.

But they rebelled<WH4784> against me, and would<WH14> not hearken<WH8085> unto me: they did not every man<WH376> cast away<WH7993> the abominations<WH8251> of their eyes<WH5869>, neither did they forsake<WH5800> the idols<WH1544> of Egypt<WH4714>: then I said<WH559>, I will pour out<WH8210> my fury<WH2534> upon them, to accomplish<WH3615> my anger<WH639> against them in the midst<WH8432> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.

But I wrought<WH6213> for my name's<WH8034> sake, that it should not be polluted<WH2490> before<WH5869> the heathen<WH1471>, among<WH8432> whom they were, in whose sight<WH5869> I made myself known<WH3045> unto them, in bringing them forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>.
¶ Wherefore I caused them to go forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, and brought<WH935> them into the wilderness<WH4057>.
And I gave<WH5414> them my statutes<WH2708>, and shewed<WH3045> them my judgments<WH4941>, which if a man<WH120> do<WH6213>, he shall even live<WH2425> in them.
Moreover also I gave<WH5414> them my sabbaths<WH7676>, to be a sign<WH226> between me and them, that they might know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> that sanctify<WH6942> them.

But the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> rebelled<WH4784> against me in the wilderness<WH4057>: they walked<WH1980> not in my statutes<WH2708>, and they despised<WH3988> my judgments<WH4941>, which if a man<WH120> do<WH6213>, he shall even live<WH2425> in them; and my sabbaths<WH7676> they greatly<WH3966> polluted<WH2490>: then I said<WH559>, I would pour out<WH8210> my fury<WH2534> upon them in the wilderness<WH4057>, to consume<WH3615> them.
But I wrought<WH6213> for my name's<WH8034> sake, that it should not be polluted<WH2490> before<WH5869> the heathen<WH1471>, in whose sight<WH5869> I brought them out<WH3318>.

Yet also I lifted up<WH5375> my hand<WH3027> unto them in the wilderness<WH4057>, that I would not bring<WH935> them into the land<WH776> which I had given<WH5414> them, flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey<WH1706>, which is the glory<WH6643> of all lands<WH776>;

Because they despised<WH3988> my judgments<WH4941>, and walked<WH1980> not in my statutes<WH2708>, but polluted<WH2490> my sabbaths<WH7676>: for their heart<WH3820> went<WH1980> after<WH310> their idols<WH1544>.
Nevertheless mine eye<WH5869> spared<WH2347> them from destroying<WH7843> them, neither did I make<WH6213> an end<WH3617> of them in the wilderness<WH4057>.

But I said<WH559> unto their children<WH1121> in the wilderness<WH4057>, Walk<WH3212> ye not in the statutes<WH2706> of your fathers<WH1>, neither observe<WH8104> their judgments<WH4941>, nor defile<WH2930> yourselves with their idols<WH1544>:
I am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>; walk<WH3212> in my statutes<WH2708>, and keep<WH8104> my judgments<WH4941>, and do<WH6213> them;
And hallow<WH6942> my sabbaths<WH7676>; and they shall be a sign<WH226> between me and you, that ye may know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430>.

Notwithstanding the children<WH1121> rebelled<WH4784> against me: they walked<WH1980> not in my statutes<WH2708>, neither kept<WH8104> my judgments<WH4941> to do<WH6213> them, which if a man<WH120> do<WH6213>, he shall even live<WH2425> in them; they polluted<WH2490> my sabbaths<WH7676>: then I said<WH559>, I would pour out<WH8210> my fury<WH2534> upon them, to accomplish<WH3615> my anger<WH639> against them in the wilderness<WH4057>.

Nevertheless I withdrew<WH7725> mine hand<WH3027>, and wrought<WH6213> for my name's<WH8034> sake, that it should not be polluted<WH2490> in the sight<WH5869> of the heathen<WH1471>, in whose sight<WH5869> I brought them forth<WH3318>.
I lifted up<WH5375> mine hand<WH3027> unto them also in the wilderness<WH4057>, that I would scatter<WH6327> them among the heathen<WH1471>, and disperse<WH2219> them through the countries<WH776>;

Because they had not executed<WH6213> my judgments<WH4941>, but had despised<WH3988> my statutes<WH2708>, and had polluted<WH2490> my sabbaths<WH7676>, and their eyes<WH5869> were after<WH310> their fathers'<WH1> idols<WH1544>.
Wherefore I gave<WH5414> them also statutes<WH2706> that were not good<WH2896>, and judgments<WH4941> whereby they should not live<WH2421>;

And I polluted<WH2930> them in their own gifts<WH4979>, in that they caused to pass through<WH5674> the fire all that openeth<WH6363> the womb<WH7356>, that I might make them desolate<WH8074>, to the end that they might know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.

¶ Therefore, son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, speak<WH1696> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, and say<WH559> unto them, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Yet in this your fathers<WH1> have blasphemed<WH1442> me, in that they have committed<WH4603> a trespass<WH4604> against me.

For when I had brought<WH935> them into the land<WH776>, for the which I lifted up<WH5375> mine hand<WH3027> to give<WH5414> it to them, then they saw<WH7200> every high<WH7311> hill<WH1389>, and all the thick<WH5687> trees<WH6086>, and they offered<WH2076> there their sacrifices<WH2077>, and there they presented<WH5414> the provocation<WH3708> of their offering<WH7133>: there also they made<WH7760> their sweet<WH5207> savour<WH7381>, and poured out<WH5258> there their drink offerings<WH5262>.
Then I said<WH559> unto them, What is the high place<WH1116> whereunto ye go<WH935>? And the name<WH8034> thereof is called<WH7121> Bamah<WH1117> unto this day<WH3117>.

Wherefore say<WH559> unto the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Are ye polluted<WH2930> after the manner<WH1870> of your fathers<WH1>? and commit ye whoredom<WH2181> after<WH310> their abominations<WH8251>?

For when ye offer<WH5375> your gifts<WH4979>, when ye make your sons<WH1121> to pass through<WH5674> the fire<WH784>, ye pollute<WH2930> yourselves with all your idols<WH1544>, even unto this day<WH3117>: and shall I be inquired<WH1875> of by you, O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>? As I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, I will not be inquired<WH1875> of by you.

And that which cometh<WH5927> into your mind<WH7307> shall not be at all, that ye say<WH559>, We will be<WH1961> as the heathen<WH1471>, as the families<WH4940> of the countries<WH776>, to serve<WH8334> wood<WH6086> and stone<WH68>.

¶ As I live<WH2416>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, surely with a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and with a stretched out<WH5186> arm<WH2220>, and with fury<WH2534> poured out<WH8210>, will I rule<WH4427> over you:

And I will bring you out<WH3318> from the people<WH5971>, and will gather<WH6908> you out of the countries<WH776> wherein ye are scattered<WH6327>, with a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and with a stretched out<WH5186> arm<WH2220>, and with fury<WH2534> poured out<WH8210>.
And I will bring<WH935> you into the wilderness<WH4057> of the people<WH5971>, and there will I plead<WH8199> with you face<WH6440> to face<WH6440>.
Like as I pleaded<WH8199> with your fathers<WH1> in the wilderness<WH4057> of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, so will I plead<WH8199> with you, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
And I will cause you to pass<WH5674> under the rod<WH7626>, and I will bring<WH935> you into the bond<WH4562> of the covenant<WH1285>:

And I will purge out<WH1305> from among you the rebels<WH4775>, and them that transgress<WH6586> against me: I will bring them forth<WH3318> out of the country<WH776> where they sojourn<WH4033>, and they shall not enter<WH935> into the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>: and ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>.

As for you, O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Go<WH3212> ye, serve<WH5647> ye every one<WH376> his idols<WH1544>, and hereafter<WH310> also, if ye will not hearken<WH8085> unto me: but pollute<WH2490> ye my holy<WH6944> name<WH8034> no more with your gifts<WH4979>, and with your idols<WH1544>.

For in mine holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>, in the mountain<WH2022> of the height<WH4791> of Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>, there shall all the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, all of them in the land<WH776>, serve<WH5647> me: there will I accept<WH7521> them, and there will I require<WH1875> your offerings<WH8641>, and the firstfruits<WH7225> of your oblations<WH4864>, with all your holy things<WH6944>.

I will accept<WH7521> you with your sweet<WH5207> savour<WH7381>, when I bring you out<WH3318> from the people<WH5971>, and gather<WH6908> you out of the countries<WH776> wherein ye have been scattered<WH6327>; and I will be sanctified<WH6942> in you before<WH5869> the heathen<WH1471>.

And ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>, when I shall bring<WH935> you into the land<WH127> of Israel<WH3478>, into the country<WH776> for the which I lifted up<WH5375> mine hand<WH3027> to give<WH5414> it to your fathers<WH1>.

And there shall ye remember<WH2142> your ways<WH1870>, and all your doings<WH5949>, wherein ye have been defiled<WH2930>; and ye shall lothe<WH6962> yourselves in your own sight<WH6440> for all your evils<WH7451> that ye have committed<WH6213>.

And ye shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068>, when I have wrought<WH6213> with you for my name's<WH8034> sake, not according to your wicked<WH7451> ways<WH1870>, nor according to your corrupt<WH7843> doings<WH5949>, O ye house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>.
¶ Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came unto me, saying<WH559>,

Son<WH1121> of man<WH120>, set<WH7760> thy face<WH6440> toward<WH1870> the south<WH8486>, and drop<WH5197> thy word toward the south<WH1864>, and prophesy<WH5012> against the forest<WH3293> of the south<WH5045> field<WH7704>;

And say<WH559> to the forest<WH3293> of the south<WH5045>, Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068>; Thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>; Behold, I will kindle<WH3341> a fire<WH784> in thee, and it shall devour<WH398> every green<WH3892> tree<WH6086> in thee, and every dry<WH3002> tree<WH6086>: the flaming<WH3852> flame<WH7957> shall not be quenched<WH3518>, and all faces<WH6440> from the south<WH5045> to the north<WH6828> shall be burned<WH6866> therein.
And all flesh<WH1320> shall see<WH7200> that I the LORD<WH3068> have kindled<WH1197> it: it shall not be quenched<WH3518>.
Then said<WH559> I, Ah<WH162> Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069>! they say<WH559> of me, Doth he not speak<WH4911> parables<WH4912>?
